text: The Love Story of Aliette Brunton is a romance novel by the British writer Gilbert Frankau which was first published in 1922. ==Film adaptation== In 1924 the novel was adapted into a film The Love Story of Aliette Brunton made by Stoll Pictures and directed by Maurice Elvey.Goble p.166 ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. Category:1922 British novels Category:Novels set in England Category:British novels adapted into films Category:Novels by Gilbert Frankau
title: The Love Story of Aliette Brunton (novel)
